quest.name: Fresh Off the Wing
journal:
 Quest Sync
Bie-Zumm looks at you with an appraising eye.
objectives: Deliver the cliffkite wings to Bie-Zumm.

dialogue.name: BIEZUMM
dialogue.text: ...They say you're the reason the Ladder's moving again─that you're a womanman who gets things done.

dialogue.name: BIEZUMM
dialogue.text: Well I've got a job that no one else around here seems capable of doing. All I want are some crystal spikes from the wings of those cliffkites─and not the old broken ones someone scavenged off the ground!

dialogue.name: BIEZUMM
dialogue.text: If you can manage to bring me some wings with the spikes intact, I'll be sure to pay you what they're worth.

dialogue.name: BIEZUMM
dialogue.text: You want to make some coin? Just bring me some cliffkite wings with the crystals still attached.

dialogue.name: BIEZUMM
dialogue.text: Right, what have you got there for me?

dialogue.name: BIEZUMM
dialogue.text: Hmmm. Nice length... No cracks or splintering... Aye, these'll make the perfect spearheads.

dialogue.name: BIEZUMM
dialogue.text: As I'm sure you've heard, Amity was originally built as a neutral venue for trading with the dwarf clans. The houses weren't meant to be homes─just somewhere to rest your head while you conducted your business.

dialogue.name: BIEZUMM
dialogue.text: Once those relationships soured, though, the settlement soon emptied out...and exiles like us moved in.

dialogue.name: BIEZUMM
dialogue.text: The way people talk, it sounds like Amity was thriving up until a few short years ago. But now instead of people lining the roads, you've got hobgoblins and worse. That's why I wanted to make spears, you know. For protection.

dialogue.name: BIEZUMM
dialogue.text: Well, that was a bit more long-winded than I intended, but a little history never hurt no one, eh? Alright, alright, take your payment and go, then.
